tool_description: An API that allows the user to retrieve the latest reviews of michelin star restraurants.
name: restaurants
title: restaurants

api_list.name: One michelin restraurant
api_list.description: Retrieves a single review of a michelin restraurant based on document I.D.

api_list.name: Michelin Restraurants
api_list.description: A list of michelin restraurants and reviews.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://restaurants162.p.rapidapi.com/michelin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "restaurants162.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://restaurants162.p.rapidapi.com/michelin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "restaurants162.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
